propagate(bytes32).details: propagates the populated cross net message for the given cid

params.msgCid: - the cid of the cross-net message

sendCrossMessage(((((uint64,address[]),(.details: sends an arbitrary cross-message from the local subnet to the destination subnet. IMPORTANT: `msg.value` is expected to equal to the value sent in `crossMsg.value` plus the cross-messaging fee.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct SubnetID memory,struct SubnetID memory) pure returns (bool)

documentation.text:
@dev propagates the populated cross net message for the given cid
 @param msgCid - the cid of the cross-net message

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct SubnetID memory,struct SubnetID memory) pure returns (bool)
function (struct StorableMsg memory,struct SubnetID memory) pure returns (enum IPCMsgType)
function (struct SubnetID memory,struct SubnetID memory) pure returns (struct SubnetID memory)
function (struct SubnetID memory,struct SubnetID memory) pure returns (bool)

documentation.text:
@dev Commit the cross message to storage. It outputs a flag signaling
 if the committed messages was bottom-up and some funds need to be
 burnt.
 It also validates that destination subnet ID is not empty
 and not equal to the current network.
